answers.answer: I'm being induced at 36 weeks Hun I have gestational diabetes and I'm 34+6 xx
My lil boy measuring a lot bigger than he should at 31 weeks he was measuring just on 7lb xx
Oh my goodness! That's a heavy baby at just 31 weeks. Are you have a cesarean or a vaginal birth?
As far as I'm aware I'm having a natural birth been no mention of a cesarean Hun xx

question: I have gestational diabetes as well as group b strep . I know there's a pretty good chance that I'll be induced but I'm not sure when. I'm currently 37 weeks and 4 days pregnant and go into the doctor's tomorrow to get the baby measured. I'm pretty sure that we'll be discussing induction. If you had GD or GBS or even both, were you induced? If so, how far along were you and what were the circumstances?
title: I have Gestational Diabetes AND B strep. Will I be induced?
